item1_summary:
Bio-Techne and its subsidiaries develop, manufacture and sell life science reagents, instruments and services for the research, diagnostics and bioprocessing markets worldwide . Our Protein Sciences segment is a leading developer and manufacturer of high-quality biological reagents used in all aspects of life science research, diagnostics and cell and gene therapy . Our Diagnostics and Spatial Biology segment develops and manufactures diagnostic products, including controls, calibrators, and diagnostic assays .
 Bio-Techne is committed to providing innovative, high-quality tools that allow our customers to make extraordinary discoveries and treat and diagnose diseases . Our common stock is listed on the NASDAQ under the symbol “TECH. ny in 1985 . We operate globally, with offices in many locations throughout North America, Europe and Asia .
 Our strategic pillars include: Grow & Leverage the Core. ing strategies that position us to serve as the standard for biological content in the research market . We expect to be able to convert our continued significant investment in our research and development activities to be first-to-market with quality products that are at the leading edge of life science researchers’ needs . We will continue to expand our sales staff and distribution channels globally .
 The Protein Sciences segment is the larger of our two segments, representing approximately 72% of our net sales in fiscal 2025 . The Reagent Solutions division consists of specialized proteins, such as cytokines and growth factors, antibodies, small molecules, tissue culture sera and cell selection technologies . Key product brands include R&D Systems, Tocris Biosciences and Novus Biologicals .
 Analytical Solutions division includes manual and automated protein analysis instruments and immunoassays that are used in quantifying proteins in a variety of biological fluids . Key product brands include R&D Systems and ProteinSimple . Customers for this segment include researchers in academia and industry (chiefly pharmaceutical and biotech companies as well as contract research org .
 Analytical Solutions division is used chiefly by production and quality control departments at biotech and pharmaceutical companies . Diagnostics and Spatial Biology segment is focused primarily on the diagnostic and research markets . No single end-user customer accounted for more than 10% of Protein Sciences segment’s net sales during fiscal 2025, 2024, or 2023 .
 Lunaphore's COMET instrument automates ACD’s RNAscope assays and utilizies antibodies to enable simultaneous hyperplex detection of protein and RNA biomarkers on the same slide at single-cell resolution . The Molecular Diagnostics division markets and sells products and services under the Exosome Diagnostics and Asuragen brands .
 Customers for the Spatial Biology division include researchers in academia as well as investigators in pharmaceutical and biotech companies . We sell our products directly to those customers who are primarily located in North America, Europe, and China, and through distributors elsewhere . The majority of Diagnostic Reagents Division’s sales are through OEM agreements .
 The majority of our products are shipped within one day of receipt of the customers’ orders, other than our instruments and related cartridges . There was no significant backlog of orders for our products as of the date of this Annual Report on Form 10-K or as of a comparable date . No single supplier is material, although for some components that require particular specifications or regulatory or other qualifications there may be a single supplier .
